choices: Vore and Food at normal size
Vore at several times normal weight
Vore and Food at several times normal weight
Food stuffed vore at severeal times normal weight
1.content:
So you've chosen to embark on JP's gaining adventure. Excellent choice! I would take this time to state a few things.

If you wish to do so, you may anthropomorphize, or make into a "furry," or "demi-furry" character. A furry is a humanoid animal, and a demi is, in laments terms, a "catgirl," however replace "cat" with any animal you see fit, and "girl" with the appropriate gender for the character. Gender switching is not permitted.

Vore in this story will always result in weight gain, and a lot of it. The amount of weight you would think one would gain by eating another being fully, that is.

You may type his name as either JP or Junpei, it doesn't really matter to be honest, whichever you prefer is fine.

Gift points are given for additions/reviews, so please, don't be afraid to add as much as you wish!

The author of this story would gladly set up a system with anyone who wishes to do so where he writes a chapter for their story in return for an addition to this one. Please, Private Message him for more information.

With all this said, please, begin!
1.title: Intro

choices: Let me make a new storyline...
11.content: In this part of the story JP would eat all the humans and digimon from the show he could to get fatter and fatter, but would start at his average weight from the show.
11.title: Live food

111.content: One horrible morning on the digi world, Junpei a the digimon gaurdian of thunder was strangly hungrier then normal "hmm, i wonder what digimon taste like, i mean digimon eat other digimon right. hmm i wonder..." said junpei as he looked over at a sleeping toucanmon. "Yummy fried chicken" said junpei as he tied up the sleeping digimon. "Huh whats happen- hey! what are you do-" said the enraged toucanmon behind the gag. now all you have to do is decide how to eat him.
111.title: Alright then, let's start!

choices: No no, I don't like this.
12.content: This would be JP, at his normal size from the TV show, eating all the humans, digimon, and food he can get his greedy hands on.
12.title: Hungry JP

13.content: This story would consist of JP consuming solely other humans or digimon to gain weight, however he would start off at a much much heavier weight than he is in the show.
13.title: Live food for fatty.

choices: I'll add another story line, thanks.
14.content: This side of the story involved JP pigging out on both food and it's more.. living counterpart. He will start at many times his normal weight from the show.
14.title: Hungry, fatty JP

choices: I think I'd like to add another option here.
15.content: Now this is a rather unique thing. This involves JP stuffing his victims full of fatty foods before eating them, and/or fattening them up first to make them all the more fattening and delicious. He, of course, starts off at several times his average weight from the show
15.title: Fattened meals

choices: JP wakes Tommy, and together they go to the fruit trees
The others wake up, and JP offers to take Tommy for a special treat
151.content:
JP woke up before the others, feeling unusually hungry that morning. Yawning, he stretched his arms up in the air, his jumpsuit-like clothing creaking ominously in the process.

Over the past several weeks, he and the other Digidestined hadn't had to deal with too much trouble, save the occasional rowdy troublemaker. As such, they rested much more often, relaxed far more, and, in JP's case, ate much more. In fact, the area they were currently sleeping in had been their campsite of choice for the past week or so. It was large, but not imposingly so, grassy, and above all, peaceful. Further sweetening the deal were several fruit trees less than a mile from the clearing, each bearing delicious fruit and, in a few cases, even meat apples.

JP, letting his hunger overtake him, had fully indulged in these tasty treats, brushing off the occasional questioning looks his friends sent him. This had, of course, taken a toll on his body, and several weeks later, his clothes were straining dangerously, his cheeks were fuller, and he had an evident double chin.

Oddly enough, JP wasn't hungry for more fruit, even if it did taste like meat. No, he wanted something different, more satisfying...

As he thought about what to eat, his eyes happened to wander to the group's youngest member, Tommy. He was curled up, a peaceful expression on his face.

JP started as thoughts began to enter his head. No, he couldn't possibly...

Then again, this was the Digital World; Tommy would probably come out fine later...

JP grinned. It was decided: he was going to fatten Tommy up, and eat the boy whole when he was at a satisfactory size.


What happens next?
151.title: Hungry for More

1511.content:
Getting up, JP walked over to Tommy and gently shook him. "Hey, Tommy," he gently urged, "wake up."

Grunting softly, Tommy began to wake up. Yawning, he slowly sat up, rubbing the sleep out of his eyes.

"What is it, JP?" he mumbled, a bit irritated at the awakening. "I wanna sleep..."

"Sorry," JP apologized. Immediately, he set his plan into motion. "Ya hungry?"

Tommy thought about it for a few seconds, still groggy. He was pushed into wakefulness by his growling stomach. "Yeah, actually." Looking up at the older boy, he smiled. "Can we eat at the fruit trees?"

JP smiled, glad that his plan was working. "Sure!" Helping Tommy up, they set off, leaving the other three members of their group still sleeping.

In a few minutes, they had reached their destination. Looking up at the trees, Tommy's expression became one of delight.

"Wow, JP, I just realized: I'm REALLY hungry! Thanks for taking me here!" Immediately, the younger boy began picking as many fruits as he could, eventually amassing them in a sizable pile. As Tommy picked up a meat apple, he glanced at JP. "You want any, JP?" he asked.

JP shrugged. "Nah, I'm not really hungry this morning," he lied.

Tommy shot him a questioning look. "Ok, if you say so..." With those words, Tommy turned to the pile. Eyes gleaming, he set upon it, eagerly munching on the assorted fruit.

As Tommy worked through the large pile, JP watched, pleased.

'That's it, Tommy,' he thought, a bit more eagerly than he would have liked, 'eat, let that belly get big, yeah...'

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------

About half an hour later, Tommy finished. Falling back onto the ground, he sighed. "Oh, wow, I'm stuffed..."

By the look of his stomach, JP was convinced; it had grown to the point where the young boy's white shirt had been greatly stretched. Tommy's enlarged gut peeked out from underneath his shirt, just enough to expose the belly button underneath. The large belly was straining against his pants, threatening to give at any moment. Noticing this, Tommy sat up and unbuttoned his pants, allowing his stomach to expand to its full size and allowing even more of the lower part of his belly to show. Tommy sighed in relief, and laid back down.

"Hey, JP, I'm gonna go back to sleep here; is that okay?" he asked, stomach gurgling as it began to digest the vast amount of fruit.

JP had to keep himself from chuckling; this was going even better than he thought! "Sure, Tommy, I'll wait here with you."

"Thanks..." Tommy mumbled in a low voice, already beginning to doze off.

When the boy was fully asleep, though, JP began to reconsider; should he eat Tommy now, while he's vulnerable, or fatten him up a bit more?
1511.title: JP wakes Tommy, and together they go to the fru...

15111.content:
JP studied him further. 'Well, I don't want to get full too soon,' he thought to himself, 'and besides, Tommy's nice and full. He'll make a nice first course.'

He advanced on the boy. Grabbing his sides gently, JP lifted him up, and opened his mouth as wide as he could.

He began bringing the boy closer to his eager maw. He was halfway there when Tommy stirred.

"Mmm...JP?" he mumbled groggily.

JP briefly panicked, before realizing there was only one possible course of action now.

He opened his mouth even further, and, with great difficulty, inserted Tommy's head, which began to emit protesting screams and cries. JP swallowed, and Tommy's head slid down a bit further. Ignoring the cries and calls for help, JP continued swallowing. Bit by bit, Tommy slid further down JP's waiting gullet. First the rest of his head, then his chest, and then...

JP gasped as he reached Tommy's newly engorged belly. It tasted heavenly, but he wasn't sure if he could fit it past his jaws.

Eventually, though, through much swallowing and jaw stretching, JP finally managed to swallow the large protrusion. From there, it was a simple matter to swallow his lower body and legs.

When JP finished, his stomach bulged outwards, finally ripping through his clothes and exposing itself for all the world to see. Sighing, JP sat down, happily patting his full belly. As the screams began to die down, JP's eyes wandered thoughtfully.

'Let's see,' he thought, 'Who's next?'
15111.title: Eat him now

151111.content:
"Takuya looks like he's been gaining a little weight lately," JP said to himself. "I think I'll go for him next." He moved to stand up, but found it difficult with the large lump in his belly. This fact brought something else to JP's attention.

"If I go back right now, they're gonna ask questions," he murmured. "Plus, they're gonna ask where Tommy is..."

JP shrugged. "Guess I'll just wait here until Tommy digests..." With that decision, he laid down, his large belly sticking straight up into the air.

"Guess I can just take a nap, for now..." he thought. He closed his eyes, and in a few minutes, was fast asleep, smiling and dreaming of the meals to come.

"You're gonna taste real good, Takuya..." he laughed in his sleep, causing his belly to shake.

When JP woke up...
151111.title: Takuya

1511111.content:
The lump was finally gone, but it was all replaced by fat. The jumpsuit he wore now tore, with only the underwear still intact. This obviously doubled his size. JP then took Tommy's D-Tector and brought his spirits into his D-Tector. His clothes JP took off were also in a neat pile. He then carried Takuya, who was still asleep like the rest of the group, to the grove of fruit trees. JP carefully placed him there, and from behind a big tree, JP threw a small pebble at him. Takuya woke up, surrounded by fruit trees.

Takuya was awed. "Is this heaven?" he thought. He decided to chow down on the fruit from the trees. JP rested in the other tree, while Takuya ate the fruit. 30 minutes later, Takuya laid down with his large gut. JP took this opprutunity and then lifted him. Before he could wake up, JP swalllowed him first from the head. Takuya tried to struggle, but it was worthless. JP began to quickly swallow him. At the gut, he managed to get the lump into his mounth, spitting out any clothes.

By the time the feet entered in, JP had once again increased in size by one third. Takuya's fire, earth, and steel spirits were passed to JP's D-Tector. Takuya's clothes were also put in a neat pile. Takuya, now 1,041 lbs, decided that three people are left. Which one should he choose?
1511111.title: Now to Takuya

choices: He goes to a nearby clothes store
15111111.content:
Two people were left. JP was at first indecisive. after a while though, his stomach took the better of him. he thought it be better to just choose both of them rather than having to make a long decision. So he decided to carry both of them to the same garden of orchards he found and rested each of their bodies there. He sprinkled a little water on their faces and then ran off to the bushes.

The sprinkle of water caused both Zoe and Choji to be awaken from their slumber. They did not now what hit them. "Ugh, what just hit me?" asked Choji. "I don't know, but look where we are right now"' said Zoe. They looked around the garden of fruit with mystery, as they have no idea how they got there. "Let me see if the fruit is safe"' said Zoe. She took a teeny bity bite of one of the fruit, and said, "Hallelujah!" "What got into ya?" asked Choji. But Zoe was now on a feeding frenzy and she did not care. Curious, Choji decided to take a very small bite. Then, he soon screamed, "Yappy dido da!"

30 minutes have passed by and Zoe and Choji have returned to their slumbers with big, stuffed guys. JP, who has been seeing this from the bushes, knew it was an opportune time to get the bait. He first chose Choji and carried it into a bush farther from where Zoe slept so there would be total silence. JP held up Choji's body up high and began to eat him from the head.

As soon as Choji's head hit JP's mouth, he began screaming for any help. His cries were minimal and barely woke up Zoe. Soon, JP managed to swallow his entire body despite difficulty at the gut. Soon, he spit out his clothes and folded them into a neat pile by his shoes.

Finally, he grabbed Zoe by her shoes and pulled her to the bush closer to her. Like for everyone else, he started eating her starting from the head. Everything went as well from the devious victim, including putting the shoes and clothes aside.

Only Bokomon and Neemon were left in the wild. Like JP, they have gotten way chubbier due to their feasting on more food. JP knew they were already stuffed, but it would be even better when they are way more stuffed. So he picked both of them up and carried them to the same garden of fruit. Both Digimon soon woke up and looked around the garden of fruit.

Soon, they began to devour almost every fruit around the radius of 3 meters. 30 minutes later. They were as plumped as pigs. Their belly radii rivaled those of the other children except JP. Soon, JP took the opportunity and devoured them. Using his big, stretchy mouth, he put both of their heads first into the mouth. They made cries for help but their efforts were futile. It did not take long despite their waists to consume them. Soon, JP has finished his meal.

Now, he soon collected the Digivices of Choji and Zoe and transferred the spirits to his Digivice. JP soon gathered the clothes of his former companions and soon realized his clothes were also torn.
15111111.title: Choji and Zoe Combo (with Bokomon and Neemon)

151111112.content: What appears? One of the Dark Warriors (including Kouichi, Kouji’s brother as Duskmon), or maybe powerfully, evolved, evil digimon they’ve never met before?
151111112.title: Something appears

choices: The Other Legendary Warriors' D-tectors (minus Kouichi)
1511111122.content:
"Well, well, well. A human, what a sight, I never imagined they'd be so fat." A new voice came from behind J.P. as a giant shadow loomed over him. He looked up behind him to notice it was a giant flowery digimon.

"Whoa, what are you supposed to be, a weed?!?!?!" J.P. responded with surprise while still retaining his newfound cocky attitude. From there on out it got ugly, as the Blossomon raged its bladed petals & attempted to bite or eat J.P. "Okay that's enough, time to spirit evolve." So does J.P. take out his D-tector or one of his friend's D-tector?
1511111122.title: Blossomon=New Evil Digimon For Force Feeding

choices: Take him back to the camp
15112.content:
JP frowned. Tommy's belly had grown greatly, but it would surely digest in couple of hours or so. By then, he would be back to his slim self, albeit with a thin layer of new fat added to his stomach.

Then, a thought struck JP: if he could feed Tommy like this over the course of a few days, he'd get bigger, and bigger, and...

JP stopped when he realized he was panting, the idea of the prospective meal getting him incredibly excited. He'd need to be more careful about his cravings...

Still, confident that the plan would work, JP smiled. He was going to eat good, very soon...

Deciding to wait with Tommy, JP sat down, plucking a meat apple just for the heck of it. Within seconds, it was completely devoured. It had been a sizable apple, but did nothing to sate JP's hunger, once again affirming his newfound craving.

Nonchalantly throwing the apple core over his shoulder, JP once again looked at Tommy...or more specifically, Tommy's food-engorged stomach. He licked his lips. Soon, Tommy himself would be much, much bigger...

A few hours later, Tommy woke up, his stomach having gone to back to relative normalcy, as JP had suspected.

What did JP do next?
15112.title: Fatten him up some more

choices: "I'm pretty hungry; are there any restaurants around here?"
151121.content:
JP smiled at Tommy as he woke up, yawning. "Hey, Tommy. You sleep well?" JP asked.

Stretching his arms one final time, Tommy replied sleepily. "Yeah. That was a nice nap." Smiling, he rubbed his stomach. "That fruit was really good; thanks for taking me here."

JP laughed. "No problem." Immediately, he went in for the kill. "You hungry?" He asked the younger boy.

Tommy blinked, surprised at the question. "What do you mean? I ate a big pile of fruit a little while ago..." abruptly, his stomach growled.

Surprised, Tommy looked down at it. "I'm hungry again?" As he did so, he noticed his pants were unbuttoned. Blushing a bit, he hurriedly re-buttoned them.

Laughing, JP walked up to him, slapping him on the back. "That's okay, Tommy; if you're hungry, eat! Come on, I'll take you someplace."

Immediately, Tommy looked up, eyes brightening. "Really? Thanks so much, JP!"

"My pleasure," the large boy replied, smiling. "So, where do ya want to go?"

Tommy thought for a couple of seconds before answering...
151121.title: Ask Tommy if he's hungry

choices: They were greeted by the restaurant owner
The place was being held up by some rowdy Digimon bandits
1511212.content:
"I'm pretty hungry; are there any restaurants around here?" Tommy asked.

JP, though excited by this idea, managed to keep it to himself. "C'mon, let's look around. There's bound to be a town somewhere." Picking a direction, he headed off, Tommy following close behind.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- --------------------------------------------------------------
After about half an hour of walking, JP and Tommy finally found a town. It was small, but bustling, with Digimon going about their daily lives, conversing with neighbors, or just having a good time.

What was more, there seemed to be no shortage of restaurants; there was one on at least every corner, interspersed between lines of buildings, or even taking up a whole area of town.

The one that drew JP's attention, though, was the buffet. It was large, appeared decent, and had the words ALL YOU CAN EAT emblazoned towards the roof.

Tommy, of course, did not fail to notice this. "Wow, a buffet?! I haven't been to one since we came to the Digital World!" He turned to JP. "Hey JP, can we go here?"

JP grinned; everything was going as planned. "Why not? Seems like a good place..."

Suddenly, something occured to him. "Oh, wait. We don't have any money. Darn it..." his own face fell at the prospect that Tommy might not get as big as he wanted him to.

Tommy, understandably, looked upset as well, until he noticed something. "Hey, JP, look at that!" He pointed to the small letters underneath the All you Can Eat sign.

JP, now curious and hopeful, squinted. The words read: "Will give free food for dish duty."

JP smiled; there was hope after all! "Sounds like a lucky break, huh, buddy?" Laughing, he clapped Tommy on the back.

Tommy stumbled; there had been an unusually large amount of force behind that hand. "But JP, what about the dishes?"

JP chuckled. "Don't worry about it, Tommy. I'll do the dishes; you just stuff yoursel-I mean, get yourself some lunch."

Tommy blinked in confusion, but still smiled. "Thanks a lot, JP!" Then, without further ado, he ran towards the buffet, JP following close behind.

When they got inside...
1511212.title: "I'm pretty hungry; are there any resta...

choices: JP get's to washing dishes. there aren't too many afterall.
not eating has made JP hungry... and the Gabumon's apron says "all you can eat"
15112121.content:
Entering the restaurant, the two big-bellied humans were greeted by an equally plump gabumon.

"thank you for your interest in my humble restaurant, young humans. will the two of you both be filling yourselves up at my buffet?"

JP laughed, "not entirely. my little friend here is hungry, so he'll be stuffing himself on your food while I do the dishes." JP blinked as he realized he said stuffing again, luckily the Gabumon chuckled and nodded.

"ah yes, I'm glad to see someone who knows that if you go to a buffet, you stuff yourself. after all, that's why it's "all you can eat" right?" the Gabumon chuckled again, his large belly jiggling, wearing little more than an apron reading "all you can eat" like on his restaurant, which was more than most digimon wore.

"well, you eat up Tommy. remember, you'd best eat up a lot, I'm working for your meal." JP chuckled, hiding his glee at being able to play off his ruse so well.

"right this way." the owner said, leading first Tommy to his seat, where a slightly chubby agumon asked what drink he'd like. then the owner took JP to the back, to wash dishes. there were not many, surprisingly, and no one else was back here. "well, you just finish those up and we can call it even, ok?" the gabumon laughed, his jellybelly wobbling from his jovial laughing.
15112121.title: Gabumon's Restaurant

choices: to keep the agumon to fatten, and check on Tommy's current status.
151121212.content:
as the big Gabumon turned to leave, JP decided that the fat digimon would be his appetizer to the coming feast. grabbing the digimon's yellow shoulders, he stuffed the squirming fatty into his maw, gulping slowly, to savor the wonderful flavor that the gabumon's blubber created. soon he found the entire ball of belly that just as minute ago was jiggling from laughter. licking the large gut, he sat down, and slavered over the fat belly for a good while, ignoring the digimon's muffled pleas. finally, JP slipped his tongue up over the last remaining part outside his mouth, the gabumon's big rear and tail. using his tongue, JP slowly licked the big butt into his incredibly stretched mouth. he chuckled as he could see his cheeks stretched out on both sides of his face. at long last, JP decided it was time to send his food to his belly, and gulped the huge lump of blubber down in one go. overcome by the sensation, JP fell into a bloated stupor.

after a few hours, JP came to his senses, he realized that Tommy might be done with his meal. he suddenly realized that the agumon he saw earlier was snuggling against his softened belly, which had shredded his shirt due to the sudden occupant a few hours earlier. JP rubbed his chins as he decided what to do with the chubby agumon. it was obvious that the reptile was a fan of his belly, and he might make another good meal once fattened up propperly. donning the apron he was given earlier to replace his shirt, and still show off his gut, he decided...
151121212.title: eating the owner

1511212121.content:
To keep the agumon and went to check on Tommy. JP went over to Tommy and saw his belly was bigger. The reptile loved how soft Tommy’s belly was and JP decided to get rid of him so he could get Tommy more food. JP went up to the Agumon and picked him up. He then started to eat the reptile and made sure he was eaten completely.

“Now Tommy, it’s time to eat some more.” JP said.

He cooked up some food and brought it to Tommy. Tommy was still a little full but he kept eating. JP fed Tommy to the point his belly wasn’t able to eat anymore. He looked at his friend and thought if he should eat him or not. JP thought or a minute and decided on…
1511212121.title: to keep the agumon to fatten, and check on Tomm...

info.brief_description: The fatty of digimon gets even fatter, eating food and other humans/digimon!
info.description: No slob or strange potions or anything, just regular weight gain and oral vore.
info.pretty_title: JP Shibayama Weight Gain and Vore
